# Agora SDK

### Overview

This directory contains pre-built Agora SDK libraries for integrating real-time audio/video communication capabilities into the elegoo-link project.

### Directory Structure

The Agora SDK provides cross-platform real-time communication capabilities, supporting the following platforms:

- **Windows**: Library files and header files for Windows platform
- **macOS**: Framework libraries for macOS platform

### Purpose

The main reasons for including Agora SDK in this third-party library directory:

1. **Real-time Communication**: Provides stable and reliable real-time audio/video communication capabilities for the elegoo-link project
2. **Pre-built Integration**: Uses pre-compiled library files to avoid building from source, simplifying the build process
3. **Version Management**: Centrally manages a specific version of Agora SDK to ensure project stability
4. **Multi-platform Support**: Supports compilation and execution of the project across different operating system platforms

### SDK Components

- **AgoraRtmKit**: Real-Time Messaging (RTM) SDK - Provides real-time messaging functionality


### Version Information

- **SDK Type**: Agora RTM SDK
- **Platform Support**: Windows, macOS
- **Integration Method**: Pre-built binaries

### Important Notes

1. **License**: Using Agora SDK requires compliance with Agora's Terms of Service and license agreements
2. **API Key**: Requires a valid Agora App ID and related credentials at runtime
3. **Updates & Maintenance**: Regularly check for Agora official updates and evaluate whether SDK version upgrades are needed
4. **Platform Compatibility**: Ensure the SDK version matches the target platform architecture

### Related Links

- [Agora Official Website](https://www.agora.io)
- [Agora Developer Documentation](https://docs.agora.io)
- [Agora SDK Downloads](https://docs.agora.io/en/sdks)

### Technical Support

For SDK-related issues, please refer to:
- Agora official documentation
- [Agora Developer Community](https://www.agora.io/en/community/)
- Internal project technical documentation (docs/)
